text: The Dromnessund Bridge () is a small bridge that crosses the Dromnessundet strait between the mainland and the island of Skardsøya in the municipality of Aure in Møre og Romsdal county, Norway. The long Dromnessund Bridge opened in 1996.. title: Dromnessund Bridge
